item.title: Why does god allow gays to be born?
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I do believe whether you are gay or not can be influenced heavily by the environment you live in, as that is what makes you who you are. Twins are born at the same time, look the same, and are even brought up by the same parents, but are usually two total different people. This is because they have different life experiences that shape the kind of person they are. They may also just have different likes and dislikes by nature.

Someone posted earlier saying that there was no proof or anything behind reasoning such as this, but I suggest you do some research. There has been a lot of research done into serial killers and their upbringings and a lot of their parents have been found to be drug users/child abusers. This causes the child to hate people/life. I also know of a kid that where his father didn’t really play any role in his bringing up. However, his mom always took him shopping and to his great aunts to go knitting and such. Does this mean that because of this he is now gay? No, but i’m willing to bet that it did have some influence on him.

Tl;dr I do think that hormonal imbalances are probably the major factor, but environmental factors most likely play a role too.

Note: Been a while since I have read on the subject of upbringings of serial killers, so some of those facts may be slightly wrong. I usually have a pretty good memory.
